name: sanitarily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is clean and not dangerous for your health, or that protects health by removing dirt and waste, especially human waste: All the equipment we use must be sanitarily designed and easy to clean. The lack of sanitarily prepared food was one of the group's main concerns.
More examplesFewer examplesThe masks are sanitarily useful because they prevent you from breathing in the germs in the air.It was important to dispose sanitarily of the diseased corpses.We only buy products from sanitarily approved sources.
